gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 137, Spurs 135
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks defeated the Spurs, 137-135, and improve to 9-9 on the year. Trae Young led Atlanta with 45 points (15-29 FG, 13-16 FT) and 14 assists as Dejounte Murray scored 24 points. Jeremy Sochan led San Antonio with 33 points (12-14 FG), eight rebounds, and six assists as Devin Vassell (25 points, four rebounds, four assists) and Victor Wembanyama (21 points, 12 rebounds, four blocks, two steals) totaled 46 points. San Antonio moves to 3-14 on the year.
